CustomField.description:
The Profile Update Owner field identifies the individual designated as the point of contact for Reference Profile Updates for the Account.
If no user is identified in this field, then the Profile Update Minder notification should be sent to the Reference Owner.
If there is not a Reference Owner identified in the Reference Owner field, then the Profile Update Minder notification should be sent to the Account Owner.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Profile Update Owner field identifies the individual designated as the point of contact for Reference Profile Updates for the Account.
CustomField.label: Profile Update Owner
